item.description:
TabTab 1.3.3 and 1.3.4 Stability Updates

  • New features:
    • Added advanced regex filters for ignoring specific app and window/tab names
    • TabTab should feel snappier and more responsive in general
    • Added Portuguese and Dutch language support
  • Bug fixes:
    • Much better tab identification for non-English language tabs (thanks Fly)
    • Fixed critical bug that caused some users to not be able to switch between Chrome tabs (thanks Coline)
    • Fixed critical bug that caused TabTab to crash on some systems (thanks Curtis, Alvin, Benjamin)
    • TabTab will now switch you to the newest tab instead of the earliest when you have tabs with the same name (thanks Sampo)
